divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were having a early b-day party for my son and i w\my mother -in law over (which doesn't believe in ufo's), my husband came inside from taking the garbage out and said..there is something weird in the sky..we all went outside (me, my husband, my 3 sons' and my mother-in-law) we all saw 2 different lights in the sky that stayed in one spot only moving a little to right then a little to the left then around in a circle..they were closer than the stars and further away from an airplane..they changed colors from white, to blue to a little red. not one of us believe in ufo's but this really freaked all of us out..they are still in the sky..we had no video camera just binoculars..and from what we all saw..scared us and now we are all really wondering if this is ufo sightings..later tonight i looked on utube and saw a video of someone on same night..tonight but in washington dc take video of same thing we saw and have been seeing..we can still see it in the sky and my husband is currently going to a friends to borrow a better lens of some kind so we can see better of what it is..but i am freaked out..a plane went by and it is not a plane- and they are not stars or other planets!! if anyone else has seen something tonight- please contact me asap!! this is no joke!! it's 1:25am and i am so scared that i can not sleep!! i truly did not ever believe in something like this until now!! neither has anyone else in my family that saw this with me!!
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Marysville
There were no other sightings in Marysville on or around February 19th 2011
Summary: it was closer than stars but further away from airplane- was white then changed colors from white, blue and then some red- there is 2 of them
